mapper.insert:
insert all
into content values(#{ContentCommonDTO.contentId}, #{ContentCommonDTO.contentTypeId}, #{ContentCommonDTO.contentTitle}, #{ContentCommonDTO.contentAddr}, #{ContentCommonDTO.contentTel}, #{ContentCommonDTO.areaCode}, #{ContentCommonDTO.sigunguCode}, null, #{ContentCommonDTO.contentCat1}, #{ContentCommonDTO.contentCat2}, #{ContentCommonDTO.contentCat3}, ROUND(#{ContentCommonDTO.mapLat}, 6), ROUND(#{ContentCommonDTO.mapLng}, 6), #{ContentCommonDTO.contentThumb}, null, null,null)
select * from dual
